extensionDescription.message: Adds item price history charts to the Steam store pages.

extensionTitle.message: Steam Price Chart automatically loads on supported Steam store pages

priceDataErrorText.message: Sorry, there is something wrong with $NAME$'s price history data, Steam Price Chart can't draw the chart.

updateDelayText.message: Sorry, there seems to be an update delay of the price history data of $NAME$, the chart might not be accurate.

originalDataText.message: Sorry, Steam Price Chart can't cleanse the price history data of $NAME$. The original data is displayed for referrence.

timeoutErrorText.message: Sorry, something went wrong when fetching the price data.

regionErrorText.message: Sorry, Steam Price Chart doesn't support the store region ($REGION$) you are in.

connectErrorText.message: Sorry, Steam Price Chart fail to connect to IsThereAnyDeal.com to get the price history data.

freeItemText.message: $NAME$ is free, no chart will be displayed.

bundleText.message: $NAME$ is only sold in a bundle, displayed the bundle price history.

subText.message: $NAME$ is only sold in a package, displayed the package price history.

bundleOwnedText.message: You already own the item, no chart will be displayed.
